title: NVIDIA adds Cosmos Policy to its world foundation models
description:
Cosmos Policy is a new robot control policy that post-trains the Cosmos Predict-2 world foundation model for manipulation tasks.

The post NVIDIA adds Cosmos Policy to its world foundation models appeared first on The Robot Report.
